subject: Social Media
Surfing
Threats and Threatening Messages
lead_paragraph: The police in Huntington Beach, Calif., arrested a 16-year-old boy who made a threat against this weekend’s United States Open of Surfing on a social media website.
snippet: The police in Huntington Beach, Calif., arrested a 16-year-old boy who made a threat against this weekend’s United States Open of Surfing on a social media website.
